attributes.action: Help those who can’t afford private medication to receive on the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Because so many people are suffering to feel well enough to cope with every day life, who can’t afford to pay the prices of private medication
attributes.background: Allow those who go private for an ADHD diagnosis to have care share with the NHS though-out the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, and we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The UK Government is only responsible for the cost of prescriptions provided through the NHS. Decisions about medication to prescribe to NHS patients are a matter for individual clinicians.
